item.title: Vector Search with Lucene
item.description: What is vector search The traditional lexical search works very well with structured data but what happens when we are dealing with unstructured data like images, video, raw text, etc?

item.title: Getting Started with Apache Solr
item.description: What is Solr? In simple words, it is a search engine.
